mapper.update:
update t_talent_honour
honour_id = #{honourId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
honour_picture = #{honourPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
info = #{info,jdbcType=CHAR},
cert_id = #{certId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
talent_id = #{talentId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
`status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT},
if_certificate = #{ifCertificate,jdbcType=TINYINT},
honour_picture2 = #{honourPicture2,jdbcType=CHAR},
honour_picture3 = #{honourPicture3,jdbcType=CHAR},
where th_id = #{thId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_talent_honour set honour_id = #{honourId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, honour_picture = #{honourPicture,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, info = #{info,jdbcType=CHAR}, cert_id = #{certId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, talent_id = #{talentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, `status` = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, if_certificate = #{ifCertificate,jdbcType=TINYINT}, honour_picture2 = #{honourPicture2,jdbcType=CHAR}, honour_picture3 = #{honourPicture3,jdbcType=CHAR} where th_id = #{thId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select honour_id from t_talent_honour where talent_id = #{talentId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and `status` = 1
select count(th_id) from t_talent_honour where cert_id = #{certId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
